DOC.brief_summary: The investigator show add internet behavioral weight loss program statewide campaign improve weight loss outcome . However , follow-up data suggest intervention stop , participant begin experience weight regain . Thus , purpose project extend line work pilot test health coach monetary incentive weight loss maintenance . The investigator hypothesize coach incentive improve longer-term weight outcome .
DOC.brief_title: State-wide Health Approach Increase Reach Effectiveness : Study 3
DOC.criteria: 1 . Body Mass Index > =25kg/m2 2 . English speak 1 . Health problem make weight loss unsupervised exercise unsafe 2 . Current pregnancy plan become pregnant next 12 month 3 . Planned relocation 4 . Previous participation Shape Up Rhode Island research study
